budget_title: Office of the Secretary of Defense
explanation: Funds are required to resource microelectronics research maturation development and workforce development initiatives.

Section 102(b)(1) of the CHIPS Act of 2022 requires that the $400.0 million appropriated by section 102(b)(2)(C) of that Act for FY 2024 for the CHIPS for America Defense Fund be transferred to and merged with accounts within the Department of Defense.
